show_name: Blood Reign: Curse of the Yoma (OAV)
plot: A terrible war has ravaged the land, and now, fueled by the blood of numerous fallen warriors, the Yoma, demons from hell, emerge once more. A skilled ninja seeks to end the bloodshed these demons inflict upon humanity, but to do this he must fight against his undead former best friend and fellow ninja who was killed in battle and has been resurrected to serve the Yoma.
ending_theme: "Ashita e no Prologue" (未来へのプロローグ; "Prologue for Tomorrow") by Midori Karashima
insert_song: "Yōma Kazoe Uta" (妖魔数え唄) by Midori Karashima
